name: Anagram CLASSIC
description:
★★★ BEST WORD PUZZLE
★★★ GAME OF THE YEAR

How this addictive game works is easy: Push the scrambled letters together to make one of the required words in the various word lengths (4 to 12 letters).

The aim of the game, in addition to automatically training your brain, is to release the most valuable tiles.

In contrast to other letter puzzle games, an english word can be made from every group of scrambled letters.

If you need help in forming a word, helpful position tips are available as well as the complete solution in emergencies! But take care! These words don't count towards releasing new tiles.

### Features:
– Thousands of English words
– Simple, intuitive controls (Drag&Drop)
– Detailed graphics and interface
– Fitting sound effects and relaxing music
– Statistics on all the words
– Hours and hours of puzzle fun
– Train your brain and improve your concentration
– Fun for the whole family
– Game instructions

Try and download this amazing app NOW – IT’S FREE! Then decide if you like to experience more - fair, right?
